title: 谁有Authme汉化文本？
author: 2014丶小皇帝
txt_content: 谁有？  帮帮我，我服务器的玩家都说注册插件不是汉化的！  他们就不会用！

replies.author: 春情只到梨花薄
replies.txt_content:
进入plugins/authme/messages_en
下面的复制进去就行了



unknown_user: '&a用户名不允许！'
unsafe_spawn: '&a你离开的地方不安全，带你去安全的出生点。'
not_logged_in: '&cNot logged in!'
reg_voluntarily: '&a使用 /register 你的密码 再输入一次你的密码 来开始你的坑爹生活'
usage_log: '&c使用  /login 你的密码 来登录'
wrong_pwd: '&c少年，你的密码输入错误！&a忘记密码找腐竹或他的朋友'
unregistered: '&c成功反注册!'
reg_disabled: '&c注册关闭，无法注册。'
valid_session: '&cSession login'
login: '&c少年恭喜你成功登录了!'
vb_nonActiv: '&aYour Account isent Activated yet check your Emails!'
user_regged: '&c少年你使用的用户名已经被注册过了。'
usage_reg: '&a少年使用 /register 你的密码 再输入一次你的密码 来开始你的坑爹生活'
max_reg: '&a少年别刷物品了 你注册的用户名的最大数量！'
no_perm: '&cNo Permission'
error: '&fAn error ocurred; Please contact the admin'
login_msg: '&c少年用密码登录 "/login 你的密码"'
reg_msg: '&a少年使用 /register 你的密码 再输入一次你的密码 来开始你的坑爹生活'
usage_unreg: '&cUsage: /unregister password'
pwd_changed: '&cPassword changed!'
user_unknown: '&cUsername not registered'
password_error: '&aPassword doesnt match'
unvalid_session: '&aSession Dataes doesnt corrispond Plaese wait the end of session'
reg_only: '&aRegistered players only! Please visit http://example.com to register'
logged_in: '&cAlready logged in!'
logout: '&c成功登出！'
same_nick: '&a同样的名字已经被使用。'
registered: '&c成功注册!'
pass_len: '&aYour password dind''t reach the minimum length or exeded the max length'
reload: '&aConfiguration and database has been reloaded'
timeout: '&a登录超时'
usage_changepassword: '&aUsage: /changepassword oldPassword newPassword'
name_len: '&cYour nickname is too Short or too long'
regex: '&cYour nickname contains illegal characters. Allowed chars: REG_EX'
add_email: '&cPlease add your email with : /email add yourEmail confirmEmail'
bad_database_email: '[AuthMe] This /email command only available with MySQL and SQLite,
  contact an Admin'
recovery_email: '&c忘记了你的密码？ 请使用 /email recovery <你的邮箱>'
reg_email_msg: '&cPlease register with "/register <email> <confirmEmail>"'
usage_captcha: '&cUsage: /captcha <theCaptcha>'
wrong_captcha: '&cWrong Captcha, please use : /captcha THE_CAPTCHA'
valid_captcha: '&cYour captcha is valid !'
kick_forvip: '&cA VIP Player join the full server!'
kick_fullserver: '&cThe server is actually full, Sorry!'
usage_email_add: '&fUsage: /email add <Email> <confirmEmail> '
usage_email_change: '&Usage: /email change <old> <new> '
usage_email_recovery: '&Usage: /email recovery <Email>'
email_add: '[AuthMe] /email add <Email> <confirmEmail>'
new_email_invalid: '[AuthMe] New email invalid!'
old_email_invalid: '[AuthMe] Old email invalid!'
email_invalid: '[AuthMe] Invalid Email !'
email_added: '[AuthMe] Email Added !'
email_confirm: '[AuthMe] Confirm your Email !'
email_changed: '[AuthMe] Email Change !'
email_send: '[AuthMe] Recovery Email Send !'
